mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order SET iuser = #{iuser}, total_price = #{totalOrderPrice}, iaddress = #{iaddress}
mapper.select: SELECT ipayment_option, payment_option FROM t_payment_option WHERE ipayment_option != 1
SELECT A.iorder, A.total_price AS totalOrderPrice, SUM(B.product_cnt) AS totalProductCnt FROM t_order A JOIN t_order_details B ON A.iorder = B.iorder AND A.iorder = #{iorder} GROUP BY B.iorder
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET iaddress = #{iaddress}, addressee_nm = #{addresseeNm}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, ipayment_option = #{ipaymentOption}, process_state = #{processState} WHERE (iorder, iuser) = (#{iorder}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iorder, A.addressee_nm, A.phone_number, A.email, B.zip_code, B.address, B.address_detail, C.payment_option, DATE(A.created_at) as createdAt FROM t_order A JOIN t_address B ON A.iaddress = B.iaddress JOIN t_payment_option C ON A.ipayment_option = C.ipayment_option WHERE (A.iuser, A.iorder) = (#{iuser}, #{iorder})

SELECT DATE(a.created_at) createdAt, a.iorder, b.idetails, b.refund_fl refundFl, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_review WHERE ireview = b.idetails) reviewFl, if(a.delete_fl = 1, 1, if(b.refund_fl = 1, 2, 0)) orderFl FROM t_order a INNER JOIN t_order_details b ON a.iorder = b.iorder WHERE a.iuser = #{iuser}
-1 DAY
-1 WEEK
-1 MONTH
-90 DAY
-180 DAY
AND process_state = #{processStateCode}
AND (a.delete_fl = 1 OR b.refund_fl = 1)
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
